job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of creating and managing data pipelines, which are essential for data integration and processing within software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: create foundational data models in our data warehouse
job_tasks.justification: Building data models within a data warehouse is a fundamental software engineering task related to data architecture and management within an application's data layer.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate new data sources using DataOps best practices, including documentation and testing
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the integration of new components (data sources) into existing systems, following established software development practices (DataOps, documentation, testing).

job_tasks.phrase: support other data specialists in their work to make their queries and tables efficient and their use of data effective
job_tasks.justification: This involves providing technical support and expertise to optimize data-related functionalities, which falls under the umbrella of software engineering support and best practices.

job_tasks.phrase: build and maintain data models, libraries and the tooling supporting data processing
job_tasks.justification: This is a clear statement of software development responsibilities, focusing on building and maintaining core components of a data platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team members to collect business requirements, define successful outcomes, and design data models
job_tasks.justification: Collecting requirements and designing data models are foundational software engineering activities that bridge business needs and technical implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage raw data in our data warehouse to build a curated data models
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of transforming and structuring data within a data warehouse, a core task in data engineering and software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Write production quality ELT code (Python, SQL) with an eye towards performance and maintainability
job_tasks.justification: Writing production-quality code in specific languages with a focus on performance and maintainability is a direct software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Create and maintain architecture and systems documentation
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of architecture and systems is a standard software engineering practice to ensure clarity and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintain our data catalog as a scalable resource to support self-service and serve as single source of truth for data definition
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data catalog involves maintaining a system resource for data definition and accessibility, which is a software engineering task related to data governance and platform management.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training to help deliver optimal, DRY, and scalable database designs and queries
job_tasks.justification: This involves sharing technical expertise, conducting code reviews, and training on best practices for database design and queries, all of which are core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve, manage, and teach code maintainability and performance standards in code submitted and reviewed
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on establishing and enforcing coding standards, which is a fundamental aspect of software engineering quality assurance and team development.

job_tasks.phrase: Help our team maintain and improve the infrastructure for data collection, processing, management and analysis
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and improving infrastructure for data operations is a software engineering task, akin to DevOps for data systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, design, implement and drive new solutions and software for solving complex data processing problems across all of DeepL
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the full software development lifecycle from research and design to implementation and driving solutions for complex problems.

job_tasks.phrase: Work on our internal tools to make the data easily accessible to our internal stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining internal tools to improve data accessibility is a software engineering task focused on internal product development.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with team members to collect business requirements, define successful outcomes, and design data models
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with team members and collecting business requirements, which are key communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Provide data modeling expertise to all team members through code reviews, pair programming, and training
soft_skills.justification: Sharing expertise, conducting code reviews, and training others are all forms of communication and collaboration aimed at improving team performance.
This directly states the importance of open communication and feedback, which are core communication and collaboration skills.
This phrase directly indicates the value placed on collaboration.
Providing and receiving direct feedback is a key aspect of effective communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: leading with empathy makes us better together
soft_skills.justification: Empathy in leadership and teamwork fosters better collaboration and communication.
The provision of a learning budget signifies an emphasis on continuous learning and professional development.

soft_skills.justification: The act of driving new solutions and taking ownership of problem-solving demonstrates innovation and initiative.
Hackathons encourage innovation, experimentation, and taking initiative on passion projects.

soft_skills.justification: This statement directly highlights the importance of initiative, impact, and creativity, which are key components of innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on tasks related to building, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines, data models, and internal tools using Python and SQL. There is no mention of AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or any specific AI/ML frameworks or models. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer' with a specialization in data engineering and analytics.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed regarding the responsibilities, technologies, and team collaboration aspects. It explicitly outlines traditional data engineering tasks and does not mention any AI or ML specific responsibilities, making the classification straightforward and highly confident.
